data.text: Good game, it's fun, teaches about timing, but one of my downfalls of this game is whenever my battery is the slightest bit low like about 10%-5% it starts getting really glitchy, to the point where I will be dead but the music is still playing. And yes I have done everything, I've reset my phone, I've cleared storage, I've been in a 100% working Internet environment, and it still does not work. Still a good game I would recommend and if you don't have the same problem as me then Its a nice game

The ads can get a little annoying at times but are very minimal and don't interrupt your gameplay. One issue is the auto checkpoints, often I will use them in practice and it will spawn right before a spike or during a jump, so every time I respawn, I die. I've tried turning it off and placing checkpoints myself, but it's too hard to do while multitasking. It would be nice to have pre-placed checkpoints for every level.

This is a GREAT game! I love how there's little emojis that tell you how easy or hard the level is. I also like the viarety of levels! There's so many! There's also not many ads which makes me happy because you don't get interrupted while playing. The only thing I suggest is on the practice mode, keep it the same like how where you leave off you respawn, but add the actual song that goes with the level. Overall, I really think this game is good and it is great to play when you're bored!

I like the Game but it isn't close to perfection. At random times when I am playing a level it pauses the level when I didn't even press my screen and messes me up a lot. I dislike that when you jump in practice mode and you end up dying, you keep jumping on the next attempt without even jumping. In addition I dislike that the music changes when you go into practice mode because I like the normal music. But the game is very fun and engaging. I highly reccomend Geometery Dash games. DOWNLOAD IT

I really love the game play and the art work for the very detailed backgrounds but deffinitly for the blocks and the characters. But there is one problem when you collect coins in the levels it won't add up to the total amount of the coins you need to get to the sorta secret level. On that sorta secret level you need 10 couuns but every time I ccolect one it does not add up to the total. It's a litttle hard to explain.

The game is good except "Dash." The level Dash keeps lagging on the ship and a little bit after the ship into the robot for a short period of time, I can't fix this problem because the settings won't help. I don't know why the ship is making my phone lag but I just want to be able to play the level lag free. Another thing is, that all the new levels are insane difficulty, I think it would be better to have lower difficulty levels so we can have more levels each update than just one single level.

even though this isn't the full version of geomatry dash, it's still amazing. With more levels than meltdown and subzero, and there are more difficult levels to vary. I would consider getting this if you don't want to buy the full version. The music is a absolute banger. The only thing that I do not like is the ads. It's literally every time you die a couple times or when you beat the level. I don't know if geomatry dash can do this, but please add more demon levels. I really enjoy club step!!!

a great skill game, you have meny levels to play and can get cool things, by doing challenges like new colors and new characters. it's really good but stressful if you don't have good practice. it's also fun to uninstall the game and reinstall it so you can get stuff again. the ads are annoying but easy to stop, just go offline before you enter the game. it's also nice to record the music of the levels. and there's no inappropriate stuff, and it's really fun try it yourself!! so five stars ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

I love this Game!!!! Even though I'm stuck on Can't Let Go, try harder levels. On XStep I fly off the map then die. There is soo much adds. I keep getting the same add over and over again. But it is still an AWESOME GAME. But I don't like the practice mode music. I want it to be the normal music. My favorite level is Electrodynamics and XStep. Update: Thanks for fixing the bug on XStep.

The game is the best 2d game I have ever played. I like the emojis to show U how hard the level is. And, on top of that, there R a lot of obstacles that you face to make the game challenging, and the music is really good. There R ads throughout the game, but only appear every so often, like one ad per five tries. The ads are also skippable. Those people who rate this bad R WRONG!! This game is so fun, and there are SO many skins and colors you can get for all of your thingies. Also, NO WIFI!!!!!

OMG!!! I got to say, this type of series in the best. I like the backrounds and music for every different stages. The music is very catchy. And I like how they put different different difficulties in different levels. The ads are not that annoying. Anyways, there is barely not many ads. I give this game a five star rated because I love everything about this game. The levels, the music, and the challenges in every levels. I always enjoy this App on my free time. I think this is the best App ever.

Geometry Dash is a classic game where you're a cube that jumps and avoids shapes. This game is great because you can customize your cube and play loads of levels, which can be challenging. However, there are ads every 2 tries if playing, and this causes me to quit quite often. I might unistall because of this. Yes, I know ads are how you make your money, but every two tries?!? The only trick I found to stop ads has recently stopped working. (Turning wifi off) Please make this more enjoyable!

Fun. Ads are a little much but it contains many of the main levels from full game and you can always turn off internet. If you struggle, then that's just a skill issue on your part. Edit 1: If the click delay is too much, then it's probably the phone because it's not an issue on higher end devices. Also the random pausing and ads can be avoided provided you turn off internet BEFORE opening app.

Actually it's a 9.6, it's a nice game but there is a problem with the ads. You see, and I noticed it's fine that when you die maybe an add appears but the adds are making me die to make the add appear, it happened It to me Everytime that I have the Internet on. That's why I turn it off before play it. But out of that is my fav game. Just finished all levels buying the original one!

Out of all the childhood games I have revisited, Geometry Dash holds up the best. If you don't mind ads every 5th or 6th play, this is a simple, engaging rhythm-platformer that leans towards a harder difficulty, which I appreciate. What kept me coming back is the outstanding soundtrack with a mix of EDM, techno, and dubstep, genres that I don't usually care for.

This game is my favorite! It's fun, entertaining, and has so many levels! My brother found it as an ad and he finished all the levels. It's very intriguing watching him. I love the little character you use and you can change the color how you want it. The levels get a bit harder each time but there's so many levels that it's not even boring. The music gets you ‚ú®VIBIN‚ú® as you play and the colors with the levels are really interesting. I recommend downloading when your boredom takes over!!! ‚ù§Ô∏èü§©ü§ñ

I love this game and it's got 16 levels which is pretty good for something that seems somewhat like a sample of the full version. It has ads but I just turn off the internet on my phone and the end. Despite the small amount of icon character thingies you can unlock from this version it still has nice looking ones. Update: I beat all the levels except clubstep (76%), electrodynamix (95%) and hexagon force (42%) also I found out GD world exists and it's pretty good :D

I like it except for the ads I amen I'm fine with ads but if your in the middle of a run and your almost at the end then you get an ad it goes to this screen where either way you have to restart the ENTIRE level and also I don't like the fact that some most of the skins and colors you have to get the full version for but other than those two things I recommend it it's fun.

Overall this is a great game. Sad they removed the full version from the store, but overall, great. I'd give it a 5 star review if personally I didn't get the same ad every ad I see. It's always a Ford advertisement. Other than that, I would like to have access to alot more colors for characters. Most of them you can only get on the full version. Anyway, the music is AMAZING! I love the theme for Jumper. But I hope other people find this review helpful. (RobTopGames, you're amazing!!)

It's a really fun game expecially when you win and like finished 100%! I enjoy it and play it when I free time. I think it's a good game for like when you just want to relax. I do it like 24/7 like when I'm eating or laying around, etc. There's nothing wrong with it except the ads I don't really like them but it's whatever. There's not too many ads, so yeah I rate it 5 Star's!

awesome game, i 100% almost every level + coins. full version has much more content and usermade levels, but "lite" is by no means barebones, it has enough awesome stuff that i played for actual years before finally trying the full version, only because i wanted to create my own levels with the new update. still love replaying the levels from time to time bc the music and design is so cool. HIGHLY recommend, and even higherly recommend getting the full version if you love lite :3

Overall, Geometry Dash is a really fun game. I enjoy telling my parents I'm learning my shapes and then laughing. Although, there is one bug. Sometimes, I'll be playing and it will randomly pause like right before it jump into something and when I unpause, I don't have enough time to jump so I just die and reset. It rarely happened though...maybe once every two or three time I log on? But like I said, Geometry Dash is a very fun game and I recommend it to people with nothing better to do!üòÇ

I honestly like the soundtracks and the levels but I have been trying to get the full version on every device but it judt dosen't work at all. Althought this game is so amazing, I would still rate it a 5 because of its color, soundtracks, and all of the levels. Can someone tell me what device I can use to get the full version please.

My honest opinion: It is probably the most chill game out there. Eh, can be frustrating sometimes but thats part of it. There's no bugs, the ads are balanced, and the levels are extremley well made. The music to the levels are just so well done. If I were to have one game on why phone it would be this. Would give it 100 stars if I could. Totally recommend 10/10

I (obviously) stopped playing the Lite version after buying the full version, but I realized Lite is now updated to 2.2. I'm mostly seeing a lot of quality of life improvements, which is always nice. The customization area has been changed to show every color on a single page. Icons are now used to show things like "you will become rocket" instead of you needing to know what color ring does what. Some glitches I've encountered with character speed and save data also seem to be fixed.

This is a a very fun, pleasing, and adventurous game! I love the music, the colors, the character, the prizes, etc! The adds are very annoying but I understand they have to get their pay. I really want the full version but I don't have a card :((. But I am grateful for the games here! I would rate this a really high 4 or 5! Mostly 5 because this is a phenomenal game! The other games are phenomenal, fun, and fantastic aswell!!

Great game! Ignore all the people who rate 1 star because it's "hard" You can't rate a game based on it's difficulty. This game is SUPPOSED to be hard! I've only beat 3 levels lol. Ads are a bit annoying sometimes. I love the music too! Although I wish it would stick with the level's music on practice mode instead of the same practice mode music. Other than that this game is awesome.

This is a very good game... but, when i am tapping the screen on my chromebook it sometimes wont jump, or even crashes! This is a very annoying bug that if possible, i would love to be fixed. Otherwise this game is amazing to keep you occupied for HOURS, and it works offline, or on airplane mode. Great game! Have a good day, hope this reveiw helped! :]

I absolutely love geometry dash and when I discovered i could download it on my chromebook, I immediately dowloaded it. It's both fun and challenging at the same time. The reason I gave it a four star review is because sometimes when I tap on the screen, my character either doesn't jump, or jumps late. THis is very annoying when you're very far into a level and it doesn't jump and gets you killed. Other than this, the game is amazing and I totally recomend downloading it.

This game is one of my past time favorites. So far, this is the third time I installed the game. I can complete one level each week. You should really make level 14; it been saying "coming soon" for over a year. One problem I had with the game was advertisments, which may appear on my photos. Also, I recommend this game be played on a tablet instead of a phone, since larger screens work better.

Absolutely obsessed! I love the graphics, the music, the simplicity of the premise, everything. I especially love the way the jumps sync with the beat. Of course I could do without the ads but there aren't nearly as many as some other games. One area of improvement would be the practice mode. The check points always leave you in the worst positions. If it weren't for the feature to delete check points practice mode would be harder than normal mode.

The game doesn't lag, Auto jump without touching the screen, and there isn't really that much ads. Ads never happen in the middle of playing a level but happens after sometimes. It has good music, Smooth frames, and doesnt glitch. The game doesn't crash either. If you use a old electronic, there might be some issues like the auto jumping. But everything in this game is great for me. One problem for me is that they don't update that often, but that's all really.

This game is amazing! The adds aren't very frequent at all, and only appear once every 8-10 times you die. And the ads aren't too long either, and you can skip them. This game is very fun and addictive! If you're looking for a challenge, as the levels get harder there are new much more difficult obstacles so it doesn't get boring. I also LOVE the music. Not much else to say. Totally reccomend!

This game is so fun! The ads are equal to where there isn't advertisements every 3 seconds, there are many skins and colors to choose from, and you can even practice. Sometimes checkpoints spawn the wrong way and you jump over the spike or do the part of the level you need to do so you can remove checkpoints. It's fun on both mobile and computer/laptop. I can go on and on but for now I am stopping here. I recommend you play this game.

I would like to start off by saying that this is a free game! with no microtransactions and that's already a big plus. it's got a couple of ads but not to much, so it doesn't marr the game play. the music is good the gameplay is simple, but engaging. the colors are wonderful and go excellent with the music. also the game is hard, but not to the point where it makes you want to quit cause you really want to finish hearing the end of the songs. love this game would definitely buy the full version

I replayed just to see if the bad reviews were right. Many say that the music goes off beat. This is just lag. They say the game doesn't register a jump, or keeps on jumping when they don't want it to. This might be because they are touching the screen without knowing. And the ads are fine. I only saw two ads the entire time. I heavily recommend this game. And if you enjoy, I suggest buying the much better, full game. It's a simple concept, and it has great mechanics. 4/5 for me.

Great game! Super fun, and has a lot in it for being free! One thing though. THOSE ADS ARE SO ANNOYING. Like you die for the first time and you get hit with like a 30 second ad. I just get out of the game and get back in. Way too many and way too long ads that don't allow you to play the game so much. Other than that, great. Tip: To get out of ads, close the app, then get back in again to skip the damn ads.

I do hve to say, the gme is quite challenging and addictive. Very fun. The reason I have given a 4 star review is because of the number of ads. Unskippable ads come up almost everytime I die and it becomes annoying. I did get an ad blocker which helped with some of them, but not many. However, the game itself is challenging, addictive, and certainly enjoyable!

Very time consuming, and I mean very. The first time I got this (And the geometry dash meltdown verison) I spent a few hours non-stop playing this. I beat the first and second levels for both but I'm stuck on the 3rd level for this verison. I can't get past 49% or 55% it's very difficult. Other than that I totally recommend. If you're looking for a time consuming game without having to do with any waiting this is for sure one :] I also like for the chromebook how you can use space for this one

I have been playing Geometry Dash Lite for almost a decade now. I learned about it through a YouTube video, and got into it because I loved how in the first level at least, the music often matches with the actions of the player and the flashing colors and graphics of the level design. And then I became obsessed with the challenge, because it can be a hard game at times, certainly, I still have a couple levels I haven't beaten completely. But, the game means a lot to me, it's fun, I recommend it!

I love this game and would recommend it. However I do have some problems ever since the game was updated, I noticed that now whenever I want to play the screens shakes a lot sometimes it will lag so hard that I die because of it.Though it's only temporary it is annoying. My other problem was that now everytime I play a level and complete it, I get an ad. You can usually skip it but once again it is annoying. I don't know why I only got these problems once it was updated, but it's a good game.

Tons of fun and very challenging. Unlike other games where I beat them and then only ever go back to the later and more difficult levels, in this game, I constantly find myself replaying the likes of Stereo Madness, Back on Track, and Dry Out. Out of all the levels in the game, the only one I don't like is Jumper. Every other levels is special in it's own way.

This game is a lot of fun! With lots of levels to try and being free, it's good. BUT I CAN'T STAND THE LAGGING PROBLEM!!! It will slow down for a half second, not do that for 3, and it repeats. I mess up multiple times because of this. Please fix IMMEDIATELY! And ti the people who say it took them forever to finish the first level, just practice more. It's not their fault you're struggling.

This game is fast pace and fun. Once you die it automatically restarts the level without a loading screen or an ad. There's ads but they are few and far in between. This is how to do a mobile game and I wish more companies followed in this designers footsteps when it comes to ads. The music is catchy and the game play addictive. Great job guys sincerely !

Good. Love every level (except Can't Let Go) and the music is oh so good (especially Cycles). The only problem is that it's easy to rage and get broken screens , broken phones, etc. Also, it would be nice if the music could be downloaded in the game rather than from New grounds. If this all doesn't make sense, then just play the game. You'll love every part of it.

Over the years levels had been slowly added into and I think that's pretty cool. Not everyone has the capability of being able to purchase items digitally due to things that prevent them and other inconveniences/ circumstances. I genuinely appreciate that more content gets added every once in a while. It gives the game more replayability. Plus, I've been playing this game for six years and I still enjoy it a lot. Thank you for creating my childhood pretty much lol

Amazing game! You can get different characters, colors, and spaceships which makes it more fun for the player instead of being 1 and only character. It overcomes challenges and obstacles, and when your bored you play this game if you want a real challenge. The levels get harder and harder. It might lag, but its overall an amazing game. The music is amazing and really goes with each level. To sum it up, I think you should download this amazing and fun app.

Definitely my favorite mobile game. It's simplistic yet challenging, like chess but instead of brainpower you use reaction. I'm surprised that a lot of people don't know about it. So if ur new, let me just say it's delightful. Suggested for casual gamers who are looking for a good time, a challenge, and a game addiction. With the full version, only a dollar by the way, you can make and publish your own levels, play others' levels, and play exclusive levels and challenges, which makes it gudder.

I have lost my sanity to playing this game multiple times, however I still really enjoy geometry dash. The game quality is perfect, the player sprite doesn't lag, a lot of the music is fire, especially the music in geometry dash meltdown. The one problem there would be is the ads, but it only plays ads whenever you enter a level and exit to menu or every once in a while it gives you an ad during a level. But still, considering how many ads other games have I'd say the ads really aren't that bad

I love the soundtrack, the gameplay is suprisingly fun, the visuals are great. I love everything about it. I played this game all the way back in 4th grade, always enjoyed it. I personaly never found it frustrating even when dying on ElectroDynamix at 97%. I hope they bring back 2.2. Currently trying to beat Clubstep. Absolute classic.

This game is great! There are very few adds but there usually short adds. I recently beat Jumper after hours worth of playing this addictive game. I have loads of characters and colors to customize my little cube. I love how you get achievements after doing certain things. It helps if you're bored and need something to do. The music is great and helps you time things correctly! Just go to the beat of the music üòé.

This game is great. If you don't like the ads, then turn off your wifi. One thing that is really cool is that the music matches the level. It makes the game more interesting and creates rhythm. Don't let the lazy noobs discourage you from playing the game. One goal of the game is that if you fail, then just keep trying. Another reason this game is great is because it is highly addictive and barely uses battery. You can play for 30 minutes only using 5 percent battery.

This game is great and i will give you an honest review. The game mechanics are simple. Each level has a different song. Avoid spikes and running into blocks. Simple! It is very original and it was spread thru words and not ads. The graphics are also great. I think the only thing wrong with it would be the difficulty of certain levels,but with a little practice, you can beat them all!

Is very fun and engaging. If you don't have much patience, I would not suggest downloading. It takes time, and many attempts to do a whole level 100%. I have seen reviews that it freezes and is slow or glitchy, but that hasn't happened to me once. I would strongly recommend playing if you are looking for a game that keeps you engaged the whole time you play, and for a long time.

I have had this game on my phone since 2011, mostly because the music is amazing and the gameplay is really satisfying when you successfully get the timings for a tricky section. The Lite version has ads, but they are very unobtrusive and mainly only show up when you die. And yeah, you die a lot, but that's how learning works and all that.

This is an amazing game and I strongly recommend it. But ever since the game updated, my avatars glow will go straight to green when I equip the black color, as opposed to before the update it would go to my other color. I can't change it back because it only allows it to be changed in the full version. Please fix this as soon as possible. Other than that, it is a great way to start off your GD adventure!

It is a pretty fun game to distract yourself for a while, especially with headphones. It is easy to learn and get used to with the simple mechanics. This is the lite version so don't rely very much on this review, since lite is missing some of the features. The levels are a bit difficult, even the first and second, but with enough tries and practice, you can do them.

I love this game, add a few easier one like some yellow or red difficulty levels but other than that perfect. Love that there is so few adds like, wow a game that doesn't lie about adds. Love the music tracks, I'd love to see all songs from geometry dash meltdown and subzero. (BTW check them out too) I'd love if the full version was free though, you really can't put a price on happiness. Love the game 5 stars check it out!

This is a very fun game, and it is super satisfying when you time all of the jumps right. The only downside and the reason it only gets four stars instead of 5 stars is there are way too many adds. Which is a problem you can actually fix by turning you wifi off. Otherwise it is a great game and very good for road trips because as I said, it can work without wifi. 4/5 stars.

This game is a great game. It has levels that are challenging and tricky but yet still fun. There are practice modes that you can do more than once to help you and all the levels are VERY creative! It doesn't have very many problems if any ads and it lets you have more than one try without watching an ad. This game is very fun and is very time killing and sometimes I won't even realize it's like 4:00 in the morning when I'm done playing üòÇ. It's very addicting and will keep you going for HOURS!!

The game is very good. Even though it is hard, still play it, cause it will leave you wanting more when you fail a level. I don't know why people are saying they should add easier levels, when the point of the game is beating levels harder than the last. Point is, it is very fun to play (even though there are annoying ads), and its very cool.

I have this on my computer and the phone has a tiny delay but it plays the same. Unless you have a terrible phone the problems is most likely you not the game. The ads pop up every once in awhile but I died over 10 times before I got the first one so it's not one of THOSE games that takes advantage of your failure so MAJOR kudos for that. Oh and frustrated players, tap and hold the screen and your character continues to jump.

overall this is a great game. the beats and rythms in the song match the level. also the amount of adds is great. there is a very few adds but i had encountered some bugs. 1) when you tap it sometimes dosn't jump (once i tapped 6 times and it didnt jump). 2) very few times i phased through blocks and it wasn't fun because I could'nt do the course but i did make it to the end. 3) it sometimes drops alot of frames and the game is all glitchy and I can't do the parkour with that kind of frames.

Did i have a great time? HELL YES! even tho i am still on b.o.t back on track ot'a still amazing and form graphics to the actual gameplay itself is amazing. Also, if you try to jump on that one slab thingy on stereo maddess, really quickly, it's just going to cancel mostly any jumps you make after that. That can be said a little bit on back on track. Just add the other 5 levels A.K.A level 17, 18, 19, 20, and 21. Even tho all of those bad things it's probably one of the best mobile games

This game is fun! Its definitely not for everyone, when I was younger I hated this game, I was no good at it and I couldn't even beat the first level. But now I love it and I'm on level 7! I saw one review saying how it's annoying how you have to restart then there's ads. I'm glad theres so little ads and not one every time I die and the fact you die so much and it's really hard is the fun of geometry dash, again, it's not for everyone. But I would recommend!

This game is really good overall, the soundtracks are really good, the game's levels aren't too long, and the update often enough. The only reason of why I rated this game a 4 star, and not a 5 star, is because each time a brand new player would go from one level to the next, the levels rank up in difficulty too much at once, causing some players to quit the game.

Geometry dash lite is amazing. But two things. #1 I would've gotten the full game but it's two dollars and I don't have a bank so I can't do it. #2 the game really only focuses on the rocet ship and main cube for most of the levels. I'm not saying go back and redo the game, I'm just being honest and real. edit: I literally just rated without knowing I could update with 2 new levels!üòÖüòÖ

I've seen a lot of reviews saying that this game sucks because it's too hard, and I disagree. I love the extra challenge with the later levels, I have all 3 stars on every level but clutterfunk, overall I love the gameplay and concept, it's really good for a free game. I only gave it 4 stars because I find it annoying that you can't get like 85% of the skins without the full version, but I get that you need to make money somehow so it's not a big deal for me, sorry I wrote so much.

Ok. This game is fun. I love playing all the levels and stuff, but there are a few problems. I can't install the full version because it says it's made for an older version of my phone. And also, the ads. You gotta turn it down. But with the ads, I think you guys should add a revive after 10% but close it after 90%. And that's about it. Ok thanks byeee

This is a great game, I've spent hours on it. There isn't lag unless you have bad wifi, and it's a great time killer. But If you see this review, just a quick heads up- if you're not into hard games, then I don't really recommend it for you. Other than that there is a couple ads but you can skip them, they're quick ads. Overall great game.

Great game overall. I love the music in the backround especially the Back on Track music. The levels are hard and challenging but practice makes perfectüòÅ There needs to be more updates and also, I have three suggestions: 1. A gamemode where you race with your friends or other people online. 2. a shop where you buy skins and colors, and a way to earn money is buy winnng those races I mentioned in suggestion 1. And last of all 3. a gamemode where you make your own map. Thats all of my thoughtsüòä

I could play this gams for hours. And i have. Its really fun. I like to play it with friends too. Its fun to watch even if you fail. It is also an offline game so you can play it on long car rides and such. And it doesn't give you an option to skip if you wath an ad which is for the best. If you need the option to watch an ad to skip a level then you are too athetic to play this game. My piont is, you can turn off wifi andplay withot ads. I highly recomend this game!

I love this game The songs the parkour everything! I do recommend check points though and make it a little bit easier for beginners . Bc even when you first start it makes you feel under pressure. And I know it's supposed to a game of faith timing practice and consecration but you can at least make some check points and make it a little easier for the people who just start as a beginner I just think sometimes it can be a little too hard for people and they quit so if you could do that ty.üòÜ‚ù§Ô∏èüòÑ

It has a lot of content considering its the free version of the game. The music is great and the levels are difficult but fun. The ads get very very annoying for me at times, especially in practice mode when I die over and over and then get an ad, all within a few seconds. but overall the ads are tolerable enough. Worth downloading.

I love this game, especially how it seems so simple and complex at the same time! I do 1onder what the full version has to offer that LITE does not, but for right now I'm satisfied playing the levels that I'm given. No lag, (from what I've seen), cool levels, and killer sound tracks, not to mention avatar upgrades and rocket upgrades!! I love it, and I'm kind of addicted to this 2d world! Keep doing what you're doing, keep updating, and keep running!‚ö°

It's just a brain Parkour game, its super fun to play, I've never had any problems with it. And it's FANTASTIC with MEMORY. I highly recommend Geometry Dash Lit. It has many levels for you to start off with and has FANTASTIC music. üëç you have pick different colors or avatars for beating certain levels. I played this game for a really long time. Sometimes some levels can get really hard but still fun to play! However I do suggest an update were you can pick your music.

This game is fantastic. The add is right the controls are so simple and easy. I love the beat for each level and how you don't have to wait to complete a level to move on to another. There is a practice mode to help players learn the map but the only request I haveis that in practice mode I wish are checkpoints were on ground not fighting front of spikes. Overall though this game is amazing and I HIGHLY HIGHLY recommend this game.

This game is really fun and hard! It is taking me more than a week to complete one level! There was only one problem. It is obviously the ads. Another wrong thing, is that sometimes an ad pops up right in the middle of me trying to complete a level and it makes me lose. It is really fustrating because when I unpause, I lag and lose. Posotive Note: Clutterfunk is one of the most HARDEST levels I've ever played in this entire game!!! Thats all, thanks for the awsome challenging game!!!

Love the game. Not too many ads. One thing I would recommend is, MAKE THE MAPS HARDER. Within about 1 month, I finished all of the maps. Also, I would love if this game was updated more. Even though I have finished all of the maps, I still am playing the game and blasting the music as loud as I can just for the fun of it. Overall, great game developers!

The game said when I beat "back on track" In practice mode I'll get a character but I didn't. All tho the game is great and not too many ads. There is 1 more problems tho... sometimes I get a ad in the middle of My game but it puts me at the pause screen. That could make it frustrating. It is not glitchy either the music is also Very good. Sometimes it can be hard but the trick is don't get mad when you die. I recommend that you start on set. madness. Probably start on practice mode. Download

I remember everyone in my school went crazy over this game a few years back, so I decided to play it. Its a pretty good game overall, but I would appreciate if the full version would be avaliable for my current device, and free on the App Store. I've experienced a little bit of lag while playing some of the levels but I think its just the graphics, but once again, the game overall is amazing!

This game is just fun, Entertaining, and amazing. As the levels to up ofc they get harder, which makes the experience much Funner than it ready is. The details of each maps are just Unspeakable. The game doesn't lag as much, unless u have low Wifi. There may be a couple adds, but U could skip most of them after a few seconds. Overall, Fun game, I recommend definitely If u wanna have fun.

This game has great graphics, level design, and I love the different mechanics in levels! Perfect mixture between challenging and fun. And the music is absolutely beautiful! The music is a big aspect into what makes the game. So much creativity and thought is put into Geometry Dash, I love it! Of course, you have to buy the full version but that doesn't bother me.

This game is literally the best game! My brother has it too, and we challenge each other who can get the farthest. But, if you want to relax, I would not suggest having this game. After you get really far in a level, and you die you rage. Or is it just me? I don't know. But I just have 1 problamo. Why so many ads? Also, can you need to have the practice music the same as the level music. Practice music can get very annoying. Also make it so it does not jump for you in practice.

This brings me back to the good 'ol days of Geometry Dash. Jump, fly, die, repeat. Simple. I played since early 2.1, which was years ago. Whilst waiting on 2.2, GD Lite has a few 2.2 tweaks right now, and the game itself overall is much more simple, of course. One thing though; the ads are repetitive. I could give it 5 stars if it weren't for the ads when you don't have internet, but besides that, awesome game. RobTop still finding ways to make the community proud. üòÅ

I love this game so much. I play it every day! I'm kind of upset that it doesn't work too well with my laggy phone, and there are a lot of ads, but the graphics, soundtrack, and overall experience make up for it. Plus, if you turn off data and wifi it completely gets rid of ads and you can have an amazing experience with this game. I wish I could afford the full version! This is great!

The levels are ok, there are even some really cool ones, but 2 things. One, it's very unresponsive, I tap, nothing happens, I hold it jumps like twice and stops (note:there are no cracks or damages on my phone). Two, I'm playing in the middle of a level, and the game just pauses on it's own to show me the tiniest of ads, and it messes me up everytime. There are almost no video ads, but I would much rather prefer those than the ones that literally pause your game while you're playing.

When I first played, there was no lag and not a lot of ads. Now that I have been playing for 1 month now, the game is so laggy and now I get ads every 3-5 attempts. The experience is still good, but not as good as it used to be. Also, when I tap, sometimes it is unresponsive (I don't have any cracks or glitches on my phone) or delayed. Once in a while I don't tap for a jump, it just jumps automatically.

Extremely difficult, great game with even better music. By far, a child friendly game that poses a challenge for people with or without slow reaction times. For a challenge, one can play all of these levels and find the - not always hidden - three secret coins, collect them, and finish the level. Although the jumps are delayed, - just barely - this game is great with the simplistic controls, levels, and everything else about it overall. It is a great game, of which I would recommend to others.

For a free game this is really good. I have not. Ought the full version yet but I know someone who does. They just updated it and now you can play a demon (really hard) level. The add rewards were good. I also like the idea of practice mode. What keeps this from 5 stars is the fact that playing player created levels is in the full version alone. I play all the geometry dash games and in world, once you beat the last level you can play some player made levels. But no biggie

It's a great game it's just that the practice mod for me is harder then the actual level because if I die next to a spike it will spawn me there and I will get a million deaths until I get rid of that checkpoint. Also if I die after I jump wrong it will keep making me jump until I get rid of the check point. But other then those few little things it's a fantastic game.

I think this game is very fun and it's a cool block... and it reminds me of my math class cuz I'm learning about geometry things like angles and other things! I like this game cuz it messes with my brain and it's very confusing and I can't even get through the first Spike LOL!!!!!!! I really think they should add maybe a little sparkles when you win! And they should be your characters color!

Super fun game. My only problem is that sometime when I hold my finger down to keep jumping it doesn't work and ruins my run. I'm unsure if it's something wrong with my finger, my phone, or the app, but I'm pretty sure it's the app as I don't usually have issues like this elsewhere. If there's a way to fix this I would greatly appreciate it. Otherwise, phenomenal game, keeps me occupied and the music is fantastic.

The levels are not that hard, if you play a lot. The hardest level is probably clutterfunk, so save that one for last. Really good game, I want the full version for harder levels And level editor. But I need üíµ to get it.‚òπÔ∏è Too bad. EDIT: I got the full version, it's so much fun! Still love geometry dash, and always will.

This is a great game! I love the music in every level, and I love how most of the moves you make encorporate with the beat/melody of the song. I will say, this might be a little hard for people that are easily frustrated. I used to be like that all the time, but the music is what helps me stay focused. AMAZING JOB to the developers! Couldn't have asked for a cooler game!

I mean- as long as you know how to play, and don't get frustrated to easy, this is a great game! I know some dudes,dudettes,duders are annoyed that it has to many ads, but- you gotta understand that it's a free game, it's main way of making money is by advertisement so- and to those of you who can't control the sqare, it might be the device your using, if your still reading, thanks?- I think- I would rate this five stars if it werent for the way that it sometis deletes the levels, but music isüëç

This game is amazing üëè people say it swarmed with Ads but I haven't seen 1 single ad on this game yet and it is very fun and challenging sometimes you can get a little mad but other than that it amazing if you have free time I recommend because each level seems like a minute but it's actually like 5 minutes and goes by very fast. I would recommend üëåand it's only a little different than the real $2 dollar version the only difference is in the other round can make your own level.

Geometry dash is an amazing game. The songs and jumps match up. The levels are hard enough to be so addicting. The only thing I would fix is the annoying adds. It is mostly the same ad over and over again. Also the game sometimes randomly pauses if you been playing a while. If it wasn't for that stuff I would rate this game a 5.

Cool, awesome, aggravating, its a whole bundle of feelings in one! i think this game is the best game i've ever downloaded because it has rad songs, cool modes, (spaceship, ball, cube etc) and hard levels. I also have the full version of geo dash on a different tablet. I 'd say im a "average player" i'm close to beating Clubstep, Theory of everything 2, which most players get at my point. so, if you don't have the full version or even geo dash yet, go and buy it it's worth it! Trust me! PEACE!üòÅ

This game is overall really fun and addicting. The adds are the problem though there arent very many, but when they do show up, they take so long and there is no way to get out. And this game is challenging, but that is what makes it good so if you dont like challenges, dont play, and those of who complain, seriously, maybe you shouldn't have installed it because the purpose is to have a challenge. So i overall recomend this gameüòä
